languages.text: "Это было ужасно! Они выглядели как обычные аристократы низшего звена — в своих безвкусных вычурных нарядах, а потом... потом они выхватили оружие! Какой кошмар... Подайте мне вина".

traits.locale_text: "Это было ужасно! Они выглядели как обычные аристократы низшего звена — в своих безвкусных вычурных нарядах, а потом... потом они выхватили оружие! Какой кошмар... Подайте мне вина".

languages.text: "It was terrible! They seemed to be ordinary low-ranking aristocrats, what with their tasteless, gaudy clothes, and then... they pulled out weapons! Goodness gracious! Pass me the wine, please."
languages.original_text: "Это было ужасно! Они выглядели как обычные аристократы низшего звена — в своих безвкусных вычурных нарядах, а потом... потом они выхватили оружие! Какой кошмар... Подайте мне вина".

traits.locale_text: "It was terrible! They seemed to be the ordinary low-ranking aristocrats, in their tacky and pretentious outfits, and then... they pulled out weapons! What horror... Pass me some wine, please."
"It was terrible! They seemed to be the ordinary low-ranking aristocrats, in their tacky and pretentious outfits, and then... they pulled out weapons! What horror... Pass me some wine, please."

"It was terrible! They seemed to be the ordinary low-ranking aristocrats, in their tacky and pretentious outfits, and then... they pulled out the weapons! Goodness gracious! Pass me the wine, please."

"It was terrible! They seemed to be the ordinary low-ranking aristocrats, in their tacky and pretentious outfits, and then... they pulled out the weapons! Goodness gracious! Pass me the wine, please."
"It was terrible! They seemed to be ordinary low-ranking aristocrats, what with their tasteless, gaudy clothes, and then... they pulled out weapons! Goodness gracious! Pass me the wine, please."
"It was terrible! They seemed to be ordinary low-ranking aristocrats, what with their tasteless, gaudy clothes, and then... they pulled out weapons! Goodness gracious! Pass me the wine, please."

languages.text: 「ひどいものだ！ただの低級貴族っぽい、味気ないけばけばしい服に身を包んで…武器まで出してきた！信じられる！？ちょっと、そのワインをとっていただけますか」
languages.original_text: "It was terrible! They seemed to be ordinary low-ranking aristocrats, what with their tasteless, gaudy clothes, and then... they pulled out weapons! Goodness gracious! Pass me the wine, please."

traits.locale_text: 「ひどいものだ！ただの低級貴族っぽい、味気ないけばけばしい服に身を包んで…武器まで出してきた！信じられる！？ちょっと、そのワインをとっていただけますか」

languages.text: “太可怕了！那些人看起来就像是普通的下等贵族，穿着花里胡哨、品味低劣的衣服……然后猛地掏出了武器！我的老天啊！快给我点酒，拜托。”
languages.original_text: "It was terrible! They seemed to be ordinary low-ranking aristocrats, what with their tasteless, gaudy clothes, and then... they pulled out weapons! Goodness gracious! Pass me the wine, please."

traits.locale_text: “太可怕了！那些人看起来就像是普通的下等贵族，穿着花里胡哨、品味低劣的衣服……然后猛地掏出了武器！我的老天啊！快给我点酒，拜托。”

languages.text: « C'était affreux ! Ils avaient des têtes d'aristocrates de rang inférieur tout ce qu'il y a de plus ordinaire, avec leurs tenues vulgaires et tapageuses, mais tout à coup, ils ont sorti des armes ! Oh, quelle horreur ! Faites-moi porter du vin, voulez-vous ? »
languages.original_text: "It was terrible! They seemed to be ordinary low-ranking aristocrats, what with their tasteless, gaudy clothes, and then... they pulled out weapons! Goodness gracious! Pass me the wine, please."

traits.locale_text: « C'était affreux ! Ils avaient des têtes d'aristocrates de rang inférieur tout ce qu'il y a de plus ordinaire, avec leurs tenues vulgaires et tapageuses, mais tout à coup, ils ont sorti des armes ! Oh, quelle horreur ! Faites-moi porter du vin, voulez-vous ? »

languages.text: «¡Qué horror! Parecían aristócratas más bien normalillos, con sus trajes horteras y ostentosos... ¡y de repente van y sacan las armas! Madre mía. Pásame el vino, anda».
languages.original_text: "It was terrible! They seemed to be ordinary low-ranking aristocrats, what with their tasteless, gaudy clothes, and then... they pulled out weapons! Goodness gracious! Pass me the wine, please."

traits.locale_text: «¡Qué horror! Parecían aristócratas más bien normalillos, con sus trajes horteras y ostentosos... ¡y de repente van y sacan las armas! Madre mía. Pásame el vino, anda».

languages.text: "Es war schrecklich! Sie wirkten in ihren geschmacklosen Gewändern wie gewöhnliche niedere Aristokraten, bis sie ... Waffen zogen. Grundgütiger! Reicht mir den Wein, bitte."
languages.original_text: "It was terrible! They seemed to be ordinary low-ranking aristocrats, what with their tasteless, gaudy clothes, and then... they pulled out weapons! Goodness gracious! Pass me the wine, please."

traits.locale_text: "Es war schrecklich! Sie wirkten wie ganz gewöhnliche niedere Aristokraten, mit ihrer kitschigen, prahlerischen Kleidung, und dann ... haben sie Waffen gezückt! Grundgütiger! Reicht mir den Wein, bitte."

languages.text: "Korkunçtu! Alt kademeye, sıradan aristokratlara benziyorlardı. Rüküş, zevksiz kıyafetlerinden anladım... Sonra birden silahlarını çektiler! Aman, olacak şey değil! Rica etsem şarabı uzatır mısınız?"
languages.original_text: "It was terrible! They seemed to be ordinary low-ranking aristocrats, what with their tasteless, gaudy clothes, and then... they pulled out weapons! Goodness gracious! Pass me the wine, please."

traits.locale_text: "Korkunçtu! Alt kademe, sıradan aristokratlar gibi görünüyorlardı. Rüküş, zevksiz kıyafetlerinden belliydi... Sonra birden silahlarını çektiler! Aman, olacak şey değil! Rica etsem şarabı uzatır mısınız?"
